entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
